message: Starting work on schizophrenia spectrum section. Reading source materials from workspace.
Read all source materials. Now creating complete schizophrenia spectrum section JSON with 15+ questions.
Created schizophrenia_spectrum_section.json with 16 questions. Verifying JSON validity and question coverage.

COMPLETED: Created schizophrenia_spectrum_section.json with 16 questions (target was 15+) covering all 5 disorders (schizophrenia, schizophreniform, schizoaffective, brief psychotic, delusional). Difficulty distribution: 8 learning, 5 application, 3 tricky. All explanations follow ADHD-friendly guidelines: concrete mechanisms, no metaphors, step-by-step reasoning, clinical case references. Includes clanging dialogue example, duration timeline, functioning comparisons.
